page.title: 05Sound
page.content:
Today we went outside and measured the sound level Somers Town and Euston Station. We went to Euston Rd, ST.Pancras Rd, Coopers Lane, The Library and Eversholt Street. We measured the sound of a lawn mower it was the loudest thing we measured. The Library was the quietest thing we measured. Table of sound
(1) Coach 67d. (2) Coach engine 73d. (3) Lawn mower 95d. (4) Coopers lane 51d. (5) Pancras Rd 85d. d.=Decibels (6) Euston Rd 88d. (7) Library 47d. (8) Escalator 75d. (9) Euston Station 70d. (10) Eversholt Street 75d.
